mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.entry_status, b.field_id, b.field_name, b.`name`, b.label, b.label_group, a.is_manage_visible from wk_hrm_employee_field_manage a INNER JOIN wk_hrm_employee_field b on a.field_name = b.field_name WHERE a.entry_status = #{entryStatus} and b.label = #{label} and b.type != 50 ORDER BY b.label_group, b.sorting
